title: On Earth As It Is in Heaven: Spiritual Attunement for Living Out God's Power Abiding in You
description: An awesome and refreshing look at the power of the Lord's Prayer. Not just an example of how to pray, it is an unfolding means of aligning with the power of God. This book will help the reader understand each phrase of the prayer, attune to God's power, and manifest greater peace and abundance. This is a must-read for anyone on a spiritual journey, Christian or not.
author: Mark    Mills
